Camelot
Package Camelot :: Package camelot :: Package core :: Package files :: Module storage :: Class Storage
[frames] | no frames]

Class Storage

source code

Helper class that opens and saves StoredFile objects The default implementation stores files in the settings.CAMELOT_MEDIA_ROOT directory. The storage object should only be used within the model thread, as all of it's methods might block.

The methods of this class don't verify if they are called on the model thread, because these classes can be used on the server as well.
